About me

Frontend Developer

I want to use my technical skills to contribute effectively to the development of your business and I am willing to learn as much as possible.

Technologiestools

I had a full but limited interaction with the world of Frontend, I developed complete interfaces, using special applications for the design and realization of the design of websites, providing dynamism to web pages using JavaScript or other frameworks of it, helping of various helpful tools.

Vanilla JavaScript at an intermediate level, followed by basic interaction with the React and Vue frameworks.

CSS3 at an advanced level, followed by advanced implementation through the SASS preprocessor, as well as the Tailwind framework at an intermediate level.

HTML at an advanced level, used both natively and in development with the React Native framework and Vue.js at the basic level.
